welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Campia Turzii, Romania! Prepare to be charmed by our beautiful city known for its historical landmarks and breathtaking scenery. We invite you to explore and experience all that Campia Turzii has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cluj Napoca International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Transilvania Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Transilvania Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport. A password is required, which can be obtained from the information desk.
